Instructions:
 1. This application allows you to be found from
 rescuers if you are buried under an avalanche
 2. To work properly, this application requires
 that the phone has the battery fully charged,
 since it uses both GPS and WiFi modules for hours.
 Moreover the battery of the phone should last at
 least one day of non use, if the battery health is
 not good, the application can not work properly
 3. During the use of FindroneApp do not use the
 phone to play games or surf on Internet, otherwise
 you will discharge the battery (and it may not last
 for all the time). You can take some pictures or make
 some calls, but remember to do not
 discharge too much the phone
 4. We are not responsible if the phone will be
 completely discharged while you are still on the
 mountain if you do not follow the previous points
 5. To use FindroneApp, you MUST agree with these points.
 We are interested to save your life and allow
 you to have fun on mountains. 
 But remember, this application does not
 substitute the ARTVA system! Lastly, be careful, watch always the weather
 forecast and avoid to go on mountains if it is dangerous!
